mapper.sql: SELECT BNO, TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_REG_DATE, U_DATE, B_UNO, LIKE_COUNT, VIEW_COUNT FROM BOARD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BNO, B_UNO, TITLE, B_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ${b_uno}, #{title}, #{b_content})
mapper.select: SELECT U.NICKNAME AS WRITER FROM BOARD B, USERINFO U WHERE B.B_UNO = U.UNO AND BNO = ${bno}
